current.description: The specified current step, counting from 0. In the child Step element, the status can be overridden by the status attribute
current.description_zh: 指定的当前步长，从 0 开始计数。在子 Step 元素中，status 属性可以覆盖状态

direction.description: The specified direction of the step bar. Currently supports horizontal (horizontal) and vertical (vertical) two directions
direction.description_zh: 步进栏的指定方向。目前支持水平（水平）和垂直（垂直）两个方向
